name: Changes: Prototype/Greybox
description:
A short Platforming narrative that expands upon the deterioration of wildlife and nature due to direct affect of modern developments.

This is a Prototype /Grey box version.

Credit:

(The game started as a solo project. Due to the scope of the project had to  request help from few of my friends)
